Title: Renames the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Bridge the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Tappan Zee Bridge; renames the Welcome Center at the Westchester Landing for such bridge the Governor Malcolm Wilson Welcome Center
Summary: Renames the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Bridge the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Tappan Zee Bridge; renames the Welcome Center at the Westchester Landing for the Mario M. Cuomo Bridge the Governor Malcolm Wilson Welcome Center.
LawCode: Amd §356, add §389, Pub Auth L; amd §§13-0103 & 13-0307, En Con L; amd §§342-ww & 349-a, Hway L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the environmental conservation law and the highway law, in relation to renaming the Governor Mario M. Cuomo bridge the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Tappan Zee bridge; and to amend the public authorities law in relation to renaming the Welcome Center at the Westchester Landing for the Mario M. Cuomo Bridge the Governor Malcolm Wilson Welcome Center
